ConceptDef.label: creating beeswax
ConceptDef.helpText: Wax can be produced by apini at a crafting spot.

ConceptDef.label: creating honey
ConceptDef.helpText: Delicious honey is made by harvesting nectar from a variety of flowers. First pollenballs are collected from flowers then brought to a nectar still where it nectar and pollen are separated. The separated nectar and pollen are placed inside capsules and ferment over a few days .\n The ideal number of flowers are 25-75, depending on the size of the colony.
